sentences.sContent: Mr Braley has been made aware of the need for absolute secrecy.
sentences.sCn: 布雷利先生被告知需要绝对保密。

sentences.sContent: As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
sentences.sCn: 正如你所知道的那样，每年都要收取一笔费用。

synos.tran: 意识到的；知道的；有…方面知识的；懂世故的

remMethod.val: a(表加强)+ware(谨慎的)→谨慎的人能意识到可能出现问题→意识到的

trans.tranOther: if you are aware that a situation exists, you realize or know that it exists
